titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 2445) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-147, by Mr. Frost.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2445. Waiving cetain points of order against the bill. No amendment affecting the subject of the Super Collider shall be in order, except as part of general reduction of amounts provided in the bill, the exception of one amendment offered by Rep Slattery of Kansas. Said amendment shall be debateabl for one hour equally divided, and not subject to further amendmetn or division in the House or in the Committee of the Whole

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 56.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/22/1993--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 2445 (energy and water development appropriations).
